metadata.title: CVE-2021-4124 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: janus-gateway is vulnerable to Improper Neutralization of Input During WebPage Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

criterions.comment: janus: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
